original_text: How then was it counted to him? Was it before or after he had been circumcised? It was not after, but before he was circumcised.
korean_text: 그런즉 그것이 어떻게 여겨졌느냐 할례시냐 무할례시냐 할례시가 아니요 무할례시니라

sentences.original_text: How then was it counted to him?
Was it before or after he had been circumcised?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그가 할례를 받기 전이었습니까, 아니면 후였습니까?
